whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.subtitle: Professionalism, proximity and commitment to every project

reason1.title: Licensed Professionals
reason1.description: University degree in business management and international marketing

reason2.title: 100% Local
reason2.description: We know the Dénia and Marina Alta market. Close and personalized service

reason3.title: Quality Guarantee
reason3.description: All our editions are verified and 100% real

reason4.title: 24-48h Delivery
reason4.description: Clear deadlines and met. Up to 3 re-edits per photo included

reason5.title: No Refunds
reason5.description: Clear policy: Free re-edits instead of refunds

reason6.title: Continuous Support
reason6.description: Web + Photography in one place. We support you after launch

portfolio.title: Industries We Work With
portfolio.subtitle: Experience in multiple industries with real results
portfolio.footerText: Your industry not listed? We work with any type of business

process.title: How We Work With You
process.subtitle: Simple and transparent process in 3 steps

step1.title: Tell Us Your Project
step1.description: We chat with you to understand what you need: website, photography, or both. No technical jargon, just clear solutions.

step2.title: We Create Your Solution
step2.description: We design your website and/or conduct the photo session. We work with you until it's perfect.

step3.title: We Launch and Support You
step3.description: We publish your project and teach you how to manage it. We remain available for whatever you need.

about.title: The Team

contact.title: Let's Talk?
contact.description: If you have questions, want to try the service for free, or simply need advice, write to us. We respond personally and without commitment.

preference.title: Contact preference
preference.value: WhatsApp is my favorite method, I respond quickly!

schedule.title: Response Schedule
schedule.note: If you write outside hours, I'll respond the next day 😊

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real testimonials from businesses that trusted us

testimonial1.name: María García
testimonial1.text: Excellent work on our website and food photos. Bookings have increased 40% since we launched the new page.

testimonial2.name: Carlos Ruiz
testimonial2.text: Professional, punctual and with a great eye for detail. The photographs of our facilities have significantly improved our conversions.

testimonial3.name: Ana López
testimonial3.text: The new website has completely transformed our online presence. Modern design and easy to manage. Highly recommended!

simplePrice.title: Your Professional Website
simplePrice.subtitle: Modern design, fast and optimized for Google.

offer.title: Professional Website
offer.description: All-inclusive to launch your business online
offer.feature8: Initial training to manage your website
offer.maintenanceText: After creating your website, we offer a monthly maintenance service to keep it secure, updated and running perfectly. Monthly cost varies based on your needs (updates, support, backups). Ask us without obligation!
offer.whatsappMessage: Hello, I'm interested in the Professional Website from 399€. Can you give me more information?

benefits.title: Why you need a website?
benefits.benefit1Text: Appear on Google when they search for your services locally.
benefits.benefit2Text: Your website works for you even when you're closed.
benefits.benefit3Text: Build trust and stand out from the competition.
benefits.benefit4Text: Show offers, schedules and news instantly.
benefits.benefit5Text: Your own digital space, independent from social media.
benefits.benefit6Text: Optimized to appear in Google Maps and local searches.
